nodes.text: A large starship originating from Lesser Space—the term used by the Chiss Ascendancy for the area of the galaxy outside of the Unknown Regions—was involved in a clash between Senior Captain Mitth'raw'nuruodo of the Chiss and Vagaari pirates by the year 19 BBY. During the course of the incident, which saw the death of Syndic Mitth'ras'safis and the capture of a gravity-well generator, the starship was lost before anyone from the Ascendancy could look inside it. The loss of valuable alien technology, along with the syndic's death, led to both the Aristocra and the Defense Hierarchy Council being displeased with Thrawn.
